title: Predictions betting on better odds (will balance winnings more & burn cake)
body:
I think there should be a new option on predictions that allow you to bet on the higher odds (the side that pays more). 

How it works
By betting on higher odds you will get a minimum of 2.1x and any left overs will be refunded. You will not be able to pick up/down and you will only know once it starts. (limits may need to be applied per account) 

Advantages
1. Burn more cake by allowing people to bet on a new option
2. Gives a more balance win multiplier.
3. Allow bigger bets,currently if you bet big your win will be much smaller due to unbalance betting.
author: 0x42ba001719Ce41Fd28249073a7fb55630B5f9185
